actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to permit certain labor organizations to be certified by the National Labor Relations Board as representatives of individuals employed as guards.

summary.text: Amends the National Labor Relations Act to permit to be certified as collective bargaining representatives of a bargaining unit of guards a labor organization which admits, or is affiliated directly or indirectly with a labor organization which admits employees other than guards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to permit certain labor organizations to be certified by the National Labor Relations Board as representatives of individuals employed as guards.
